### In 2022

Courtney DeLoatch-Hill, Elenna Mach, and Jillian Wimbush received the "Honorable Mentions" award for the [EPA's Environmental Justice Video Challenge for Students](https://www.epa.gov/innovation/environmental-justice-video-challenge-students). Watch their [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lKTLko3V6xA) video.
